item.title: From the Depths Tour and Overseas Release
item.content_encoded: Anarcho-punk warriors From the Depths will be touring the eastern half of North America this fall. They've also released the recording they completed earlier this year as a split CD with Colombian hardcore band Nagaf. From the Depths has released their "Germinate" recording as a 13-track split CD with Colombian hardcore band Nagaf. Including members of long-running Bogota d.i.y. bands such as Res Gestae and Reacción Propria, Nagaf brings nuanced anti-authoritarian politics to a take on the hardcore punk tradition somewhere between Point of No Return and His Hero Is Gone. Their tracks on this release are alternately suspenseful and thunderous, benefiting from crisp, powerful production. The split CD is produced by the following labels: Straight from the Inside (Bulgaria) Masapunk (Chile) Persistencia, Direccion Positiva, La Sospecha Criminal, Sin Fronteras Discos (Colombia) Acclaim Collective (Japan) Disonancia Distro (Mexico) Cria Cuervos (Venezuala) This fall, From the Depths will tour the eastern half of North America; this will probably be their last tour on this continent for some time, as they have plans to go to Europe in 2010. They're still looking for help booking the dates marked with "*"s. Contact them via booking@fromthedepths.info. October 17 Greenville, NC 19 Gainesville, FL 20 Lake Worth, FL 21 Miami, FL 22 Fort Myers, FL 23 Orlando, FL 24 Columbia, SC November 13 Greensboro, NC @Legitimate Business w/Resister 14 Asheville, NC @Static Age Records w/Dark Castle 15 Cincinnatti, OH 10:00pm @ the Bunk Spot, 1818 John St, Cincinnati, OH 16 Chicago, IL with Testament, 6:00pm @ the Metrodome, 5356 S. Archer 17 Kalamazoo, MI 19 Findlay, OH 20 Wheeling, WV 21 Eerie, PA 22 Oswego, NY 24 Montpelier, VT 26 Portland, ME @cruston manor/the bike barn 547 blackstrap road, Falmouth 27 Boston, MA @45 mt auburn st in cambridge 28 Providence, RI 9:00pm @ AS220, 115 Empire Street 29 Hartford, CT @217 South Whitney Street 30 Albany, NY w/Testament 1 New York City, NY w/Testament 3 Fredrick, MD 4 Washington, DC 8pm @St. Aloysius, 19 Eye Street, N.W. (the 900 block of N Capitol Street NW) w/Deathrats and... 5 Richmond, VA

wp_comment.wp_comment_content:
if any Europeans want to contact us and get some of these split CDs can write us at: http://myspace.com/sfti email: sfti.diy@gmail.com
there are no other European labels releasing this record.
Straight From The Inside DIY
too bad their not ciming 2 santa cruz
The From the Depths tour dates listed here are freshly updated. More venue listings coming shortly.

hello from oswego,
just dropping a little note here, because i tried emailing the band booking email a couple of days ago, and perhaps hard to check on road or something, but no reply yet... i'm wondering about the oswego, ny show. i live in oswego and no one here knows about it, so unless it is super secret and put on by someone no one in the community knows, then - i'm guessing you'll need some help. and we want to help! please let us know, everyone is super pumped to have from the depths coming through our little port city... but is this just a hoax to further isolate upstate?
;-) thanks looking forward to this sunday if true
-us.we.go.
